name: Nirvana (Elerethe)
description:
In Nirvana,  players will play as a researcher in a space station. An explosion caused his death and the enviroment that for any living organism they can't survive more than 10 seconds. Fortunately the system is able to provide the researcher unlimited clone bodies to repeat his actions. The player needs to find the way to the signal tower through hundreds of loops of 10 seconds.

[Controls]

A/D: moving left/right

SPACE: using jet (jump) / start the next loop

R: erase saved actions / interact

Esc: exit to main menu / quit
